fr.lip6.classifier.transductive
Class S3VMLightPegasos

java.lang.Object
  fr.lip6.classifier.transductive.S3VMLightPegasos
All Implemented Interfaces:
TransductiveClassifier<double[]>
public class S3VMLightPegasos
extends java.lang.Object
implements TransductiveClassifier<double[]>

Fast linear transductive SVM using a combination of SVMLight and Pegasos algorithms.

Author:
picard
